message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I get $60, you get $40.  It's a good offer for you to take now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I think we can both do a little better.  I'll take $55, you get $45.  This way we both get a good share, and we avoid the risk of losing money to inflation.
Bob, you drive a hard bargain, but inflation is eating away at our potential gains.  I'll take $55, you get $45. Let's close this deal before it's worth even less.
